text: tatha jinhonne kaha ki ham nasaara (eesaee) hain, hamane unase (bhee) drdh vachan liya tha, to unhen jis baat ka nirdesh diya gaya tha, use bhula baithe, to pralay ke din tak ke lie hamane unake beech shatruta tatha paarasparik (aapasee) vidvesh bhadaka diya aur sheeghr hee allaah jo kuchh ve karate rahe hain, unhen[1] bata dega
